title: US History Quiz
description: This is the description for US History quiz

options.label: A
options.more: George Washington was born on February 22, 1732 at Westmoreland County, Virginia.

options.label: B
options.more: Barack Obama was born on August 4, 1961 in Honolulu, Hawaii.

options.label: C
options.more: August 2, 1776, is one of the most important but least celebrated days in American history when 56 members of the Second Continental Congress started signing the Declaration of Independence in Philadelphia.

options.label: D
options.more: Samuel Adams was born on September 27, 1722 in Boston, Massachusetts.
